opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Hopper v. Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

opinion:
544 U.S. 914

HOPPER
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 04-7613 (04A606).

Supreme Court of United States.

March 8, 2005.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to JUSTICE SCALIA, and by him referred to the Court, denied. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE STEVENS and JUSTICE GINSBURG would grant the application for stay of execution. Reported below: 106 Fed. Appx. 221.
